title: Life Minus 3
brief_description: A film for the layperson on emergency procedures should someone have a sudden heart attack. If the heart stops beating, brain cells will die after three minutes. During this three minute period it is vital that life be prolonged by heart-lung and mouth to mouth resuscitation until expert aid arrives.
